Description: Lets you customize how crossed out roles appear

CheckboxSettings.Name: Strikethrough Crossed Out Roles
CheckboxSettings.Description: Enables/Disables the strikethrough line on crossed out roles

CheckboxSettings.Name: Italicize Crossed Out Roles
CheckboxSettings.Description: Enables/Disables italics on crossed out roles

IntegerInputSettings.Name: Crossed Out Roles Opacity %
IntegerInputSettings.Description: The opacity of crossed out roles (0 = fully transparent, 100 = fully opaque)

IntegerInputSettings.Name: Crossed Out Roles size
IntegerInputSettings.Description: The size of crossed out roles (default = 25)
